website_summaries.verdict: An affordable starting point for someone who wants to start weaving.
pros: Two shuttles and one heddle included
Great for weaving scarves and throw pillows
A good loom for a beginner
Also comes in wider sizes for larger projects

customer_reviews.title: Nice loom, perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This loom arrived nicely packaged and nothing was damaged. I sanded the parts lightly with 220 grit sandpaper and rubbed it down with danish oil just to protect the wood. Assembling the loom was as easy as can be- the instructions we clear and easy to follow. I've put it through it's paces an it works great. The 16" loom is perfect for scarves, throw pillows, kitchen towels etc. This size works well for me since I have limited space for weaving.
customer_reviews.author: Bluskyz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size loom for making scarfs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size loom for making scarfs, table runners, place mats, dish towels, small bags. Fits good on a card table. Doesn't take up a lot of room.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I’m brand new to weaving so I haven’t used it yet. So I can’t say if it’s easy to use but it was easy to put together. I assembled it myself with the help of a YouTube video. The wood is very substantial and seems like quality hard wood. I waxed the wood before I assembled it but I don’t think that’s necessary but since it was suggested, I did it.
